items.title: NetGalley Launches Booktrovert Consumer Marketing Platform
items.description: NetGalley launches consumer marketing platform to help publishers reach influencers, Sarah J. Maas signs a major licensing deal, and more.

items.title: A Collection of Short Stories Centered on Indigenous Life
items.description: This collection of short stories sees Indigenous people grieving, finding healing, and fighting for their communities.

items.title: The 2025 Boston Globe-Horn Book Awards Are Here
items.description: Check out the winners and honorees of the Boston Globe-Horn Book Awards, one of the most prestigious honors given to books for young readers.

items.description: Which of these 2026 SFF books are you adding to your TBR?

items.description: Here are some of the best new books out this week, what they are about, and why you should add them to your TBR!
